synopsis.text: Flyer(OTF), a dragon that has the ability to camouflage itself as an aircraft. After an unexpected encounter with the OTF, Hisone is chosen to be the next Dragon Pilot, a role that will forever change her life. Alongside her fellow pilot cadets and her own OTF, 'Maso-tan,' Hisone embarks on a journey to conquer her insecurities and uncover the hidden truths behind the OTFs, all while embracing her newfound destiny as a Dragon Pilot. The key to the world's future is said to lie with the dragons, and Hisone's adventure is just beginning.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
